values: Soil is the top layer of land on the Earth.
The boy planted flowers in the soil and watered them every day.

To soil is to make something dirty or contaminated, especially with dirt or mud.
Soil is the natural material that makes up the surface layer of the Earth's crust.
n. 土地；土壤；国家；粪便；务农；温床,vt. 弄脏；污辱,vi. 变脏
